frame.name: Causation_scenario
frame.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Cause</fen> brings about an <fen>Effect</fen> that would not have occurred otherwise, simultaneously preventing an <fen>Averted_situation</fen>, which is what would have occurred without the <fen>Cause</fen>. The <fen>Effect</fen> and the <fen>Averted_situation</fen> are thus mutually exclusive alternatives prior to the <fen>Cause</fen> event. In most cases, either the <fen>Effect</fen> or the <fen>Averted_situation</fen> is clearly most prominent; this is especially true in the case where the <fen>Cause</fen> is the action of an Agent, who normally conceives of their action as either bringing about a desirable <fen>Effect</fen> or avoiding an undesirable <fen>Averted_situation</fen>. <ex></ex> In frames that inherit from this one, the <fen>Cause</fen> is either an event, or an entity that plans or directly causes the <fen>Effect</fen> may metonymically stand in for the <fen>Cause</fen> event.</def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition: <def-root>An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that produces an effect. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic of <fen>Cause</fen>s. <ex><fex name="Cause">John</fex> <t>made</t> me give up smoking.</ex> <ex><fex name="Cause">The wind</fex> <t>made</t> the door rattle.</ex> <ex><fex name="Cause">The accident</fex> <t>caused</t> them to be more careful the next time.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Effect
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Effect</fen> is the event which results from the <fen>Cause</fen>. <ex>The eruption <t>led</t> <fex name="Effect">to the extinction of thirty separate species</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Averted_situation
FE.definition: <def-root>The situation that would be the case if the <fen>Cause</fen> event did not occur or the <fen>Cause</fen> state were not the case.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Cause</fen> occurs and <fen>Effect</fen> takes place or the <fen>Averted_situation</fen> does not occur as expected.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which at which the <fen>Cause</fen> occurs and <fen>Effect</fen> takes place or the <fen>Averted_situation</fen> does not occur as expected.</def-root>
